Hi! My name is Cedric Martinez and I am an Advanced Data Analytics student at the University of North Texas, currently planning on graduating in Spring 2024. I am also currently working full-time as a Technology Analyst with American International Group and received my undergraduate degree in Computer Science from the University of Texas at Dallas. I have experience working with machine learning technology and have a passion for leveraging data science techniques and tools to provide business value by creating recommendations for business improvements by analyzing industry data.

If you would like to reach out to me for potential job opportunities, please contact me at my email: CedricMartinez\@my.unt.edu. Thank you!
